name: Arthurian Romance Romance
description:
Arthurian Romance Romance

This was originally a required creative final project that I  made for my senior year Arthurian Romance Literature class I took at University of La Crosse Wisconsin.

It kind of grew legs and now I'm looking to turn this into a full-fledged project that spans over three in-game days with three romantic options for the three unique character classes, resulting in nine possible endings. 

I will also be adding 'secret' romance options that I won't spoil for you here.

The player (princess, courtesan, or scullery maid ) must make dynamic choices to affect the knight's feelings for her while also considering her reputation and societal standing.  There are things the courtesan can get away with the others cannot, each character has a place they can travel at night the others cannot, and so on.

Items can be used during gameplay like invisibility potions, juicy gossip, magic swords, enchanted tiaras, and many many more.

The demo runs 20 minutes long, but the full game will take over 8 hours to find all possible endings and in-game achievements.

Thank you so much for downloading and playing my game!

- Arthurian Romance Romance creator, Nicholas Watson.
